name: Test Podcast
description: In this episode of Shenanigans, we sit down with Orestis — a Greek expat who came to Prague to study black holes… and ended up diving into the human psyche instead.

name: From Physics to Hypnosis: Orestis' shift in Prague
description: In this episode of Shenanigans, we sit down with Orestis — a Greek expat who came to Prague to study black holes… and ended up diving into the human psyche instead.

name: It Took 10 Years to Step on Stage — Here is What Happened
description: Meet Sahand — a physicist by profession, a comedian by choice. Originally from Iran, he moved to Prague for his PhD. But behind the equations and lectures was a quiet dream: stepping onto a stage and making people laugh.

name: Off the Pitch, On Camera: Living Prague the Unfiltered Way
description: In this episode of Shenanigans, we sit down with Aaron Dunne — an Irish expat whose Prague story began with a leap into the unknown and evolved into a life of sports, self-expression, and staying true to himself.

name: Martina Ptáčková: World Champion, NATO Trainer, Changemaker
description: Martina Ptáčková is an eight-time martial arts world champion who also trains NATO troops and advises the Czech president. Beyond sports, she co-founded “Šikana do klece,” an international initiative fighting bullying with support from Czech ministries.
